snippet.title: Dunjungle - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1589570/Dunjungle/


Dunjungle is an action-packed roguelite about an ape adventuring into the depths of the jungle, stopping at nothing to find his beloved human friend who went exploring and never returned (probably looking for treasure, the greedy fool).
You'll explore continuously changing dungeons, temples, crypts, and other mysterious places, where you'll find all sort of weird enemies and lots of weapons and spells you can combine for a different experience every time.
